Events that occurred on 2 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1946 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 258.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien is interviewed by William Cater.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Robert Havard.
1981 - The twenty-second episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1993 - Mythcon 24 at University of Minnesota, Minneapolis.
1999 - Mythcon 30 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
2004 - Mythcon 35 at University of Michigan in Ann Arbor.
2015 - Mythcon 46 in Hotel Elegante, Colorado Springs.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
The funeral procession of king Th√©oden travels toward Edoras.
